formatDescription: This format is the RAW image format used in Epsom cameras. RAW format images contain all the data that is taken directly from the camera's image sensor before the software in the camera applies things like white balance, sharpening etc. Storing photographs in a camera's RAW format allows you to alter those settings after the photograph has been taken.
provenanceCompoundName: Artefactual Systems Inc / Artefactual Systems Inc

internalSignatures.name: Epson RAW Image Format
internalSignatures.note: The first byte sequence is the same BOF as TIFF/EP files. The remaining sequence is specific to the Epson R-D1 camera.

relationships.relatedFormatName: Tagged Image File Format for Electronic Photography (TIFF/EP)
